content: **knitted hat with rib in drops alpaca and drops kid-silk ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern z-1002 yarn group a + a or c ------------------------------------------------------- **size ** one size fits head-size approx 54/58 cm **yarn** drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 607 brown and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25 g colour 35 chocolate **needles** drops circular needles size 3 5 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need an 80 cm circular needle **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 27 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
